title: How to Get the Invisible Skin on Skribbl.io

steps.headline: Open the game.
steps.description: Type in Skribbl.io in your browser and click ↵ Enter.

steps.headline: Right click on your avatar.
steps.description: A drop down menu will open up.

steps.headline: Click Inspect.
steps.description:

\n<\/p><\/div>"} You can also open this up with your keyboard, by typing Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + i.

steps.headline: Click >> at the very top right of your screen.
steps.description: A drop down menu will open up.

steps.headline: Select Application from the drop down.
Double click Local Storage.
steps.description: A drop down menu will open up.

steps.headline: Change the value to negative numbers.
steps.description: To the right of the word avatar, there are a random set of numbers based on what your avatar is set at. Change those numbers to all negatives. An example is [-11,-2,-7,-1].

steps.headline: Click the x at the top right of the screen.
Click Play!, then reload the page.

text:
Open the game. Type in Skribbl.io in your browser and click ↵ Enter. Right click on your avatar. A drop down menu will open up. Click Inspect. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/b7\/Screenshot-2019-07-31-at-5.06.15-PM.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/b7\/Screenshot-2019-07-31-at-5.06.15-PM.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":102,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":168.05280528052805,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} You can also open this up with your keyboard, by typing Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + i. Click >> at the very top right of your screen. A drop down menu will open up. Select Application from the drop down. Double click Local Storage. A drop down menu will open up. Click https://skribbl.io. Change the value to negative numbers. To the right of the word avatar, there are a random set of numbers based on what your avatar is set at. Change those numbers to all negatives. An example is [-11,-2,-7,-1]. Click the x at the top right of the screen. Click Play!, then reload the page. Voilà! You are now invisible.
